DataElement.preferredName: Histologic Response Post Neoadjuvant Therapy Necrosis Percent Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the histological response to neoadjuvant therapy as measured by percentage of cell death within the tumor.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to the combined microscopic physical features of cells and their surrounding extracellular environment in tissues._The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may refer to eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Treatment designed to be used as a first step toward shrinking the cancer and in evaluating response to drugs and other agents. Induction therapy is followed by additional therapy to eliminate whatever cancer remains.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Of or relating to histology.:The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may refer to eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to the combined microscopic physical features of cells and their surrounding extracellular environment in tissues.
The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

Property.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:Treatment designed to be used as a first step toward shrinking the cancer and in evaluating response to drugs and other agents. Induction therapy is followed by additional therapy to eliminate whatever cancer remains.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Therapy administered prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for TARGET per request by T.Davidsen and approved for release by D.Barkauskas. mc 4/24/12

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the value as a percentage of 100.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: HCMI Question Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Percent tumor necrosis (at resection, primary tumor)

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for TARGET per request by T.Davidsen and approved for release by D.Barkauskas. mc 4/24/12 Added alt question text for TARGET update per request by Tanja. mc 12/23/15
